item.description:
Posted by Rajni Saxena

Diwali Gala Party 2010 hosted by GenerationDesi.com! See details below...Diwali Gala Party 2010 - A night with India's #1 Celebrity DJ Nawed comes to Boston all the way from Bombay! Over 300+ people expected! Go to www.GenerationDesi.com to get advanced tickets at 1/2 price!

DJ Nawed has done official remixes for Om Shanti Om, Don, Golmaal Returns, Bluffmaster, Jail and more...He is Shahrukh Khans favorite DJ!!!

This Nov 6th, lets celebrate Diwali and Shahrukh Khan's Birthday!! Go to GenerationDesi.com to get 1/2 priced tickets for GenerationDesi members. Their events are catered to people who like to meet other people and dance!! Highly recommend it!

I am going with a few friends!
item.name: Diwali Gala Nite 2010 - A Nite with DJ Nawed (Nov 6th)
